actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, S. Rept. 93-342.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Measure passed House, amended, in lieu of H.R.6576.

official_title: An Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigation of certain potential water resource developments.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to undertake a feasibility study of the following potential water resource developments: (1) Hood Clay unit, American River division, Central Valley project in Sacramento and San Joaquin Counties, California; (2) McGee Creek Reservoir in Atoka County in southeastern Oklahoma; (3) Moorehead unit, Powder division in Powder River County, Montana; and (4) Geary project in Blaine and Custer Counties, Oklahoma.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Interior to undertake a feasibility investigation of McGee Creek Reservoir, Oklahoma.
An Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigation of certain potential water resource developments.
